info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 6:47PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Cleveland, south central Gaston, western York, northeastern Spartanburg, Cherokee and northeastern Union Counties through 730 PM EST... At 645 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Spartanburg, or near Cowpens, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Spartanburg, Gaffney, Pacolet, Cowpens, Blacksburg, Mayo, Chesnee, Jonesville, Pacolet Mills and Grover. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
